definition: "water" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 85), occurring in 没, 法, 流 etc/see also 三點水|三点水[san1 dian3 shui3]
to make fertilizer by steeping organic materials in water and leaving them to decompose/fertilizer produced by this method

sentences.english: " By "fermentation tun" is meant the place where food is decomposed and digested.
sentences.chinese: “沤”指的是食物腐熟消化的地方。

sentences.english: Let the apples macerate at room temperature for about two hours.
sentences.chinese: 让苹果沤在室温约两个小时。

sentences.english: There are rugged commercial paper shredders available that can macerate virtually any document.
sentences.chinese: 有坚固的商业碎纸机，可以提供几乎任何沤文件。

sentences.english: Detong, I want to write the one Fu Ou, Bubbles. Give me the file number.
sentences.chinese: 茶桶，我要写那个浮沤，给我那档案的编号。

definition: to make fertilizer by steeping organic materials in water and leaving them to decompose/fertilizer produced by this method
small plot of farm land/Taiwan pr. [xi1]
to bake/to heat by fire/to set off by contrast
